channel.title: [PI] Level up Problem
channel.description:
So every time my Constitution levels up the HP doesn't go up with it! EXAMPLE (1/1 ,1/2 ,1/3 ,1/4 ,1/5 ,etc) How do I make it so the top # (HP) goes up with the bottom # (CONSTITUTION LEVEL)
Playerassistant.java - [url=http://pastebin.com/Eee968kQ]http://pastebin.com/Eee968kQ[/url] Player.java - [url=http://pastebin.com/9552NeiM]http://pastebin.com/9552NeiM[/url]
